channel.title: Need some Co-Ords | CDBF
channel.description: Hey! I am currently making an rsps and need a way for my players to obtain the dragon pickaxe without buying it. So I thought I would add it like it is in RS. In a drop. Does anyone have the co-ords for the Chaos Dwarf battlefield.
